name: The Baguette 1789: Revolution
description:
Jean-Pierre Baguette lives in a totally normal Paris in 1789 and decides one day to stop the monarchy !

In ze name of la Patrie et le Peuple, bring your baguette as your powerful weapon against the guards and kill the king!

Upgrade your baguette to throw sesame seeds and use your new items to progress across Paris and to storming of the Bastille!

You can also get a dynamite and power it up for bigger explosions, oh oui !

Your aim ? Simple : kill the King Louis XVI ! Sus au roi !

Révolution !!!

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #51. Link of the submission: https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-51/rate/1800744

Made by:

  • Veevoy - Programmer & Artist (tiles)
  • LNarmer - Level Designer
  • WLHib (alias Wav_le_hib) - Lead Artist (characters, effects, buildings)
  • Tinybuttybutt - Sound Designer (bitcrushed SFX & bitcrushed french anthem)

Controls :

  • WASD or ZQSD to move your character.
  • Left click to attack with the baguette ! Mange mon pain !
  • When you obtain it, right click to place the dynamite, et boom ! En fumée !

Assets used :

  • Can-Can 8bit version by Bulby
